Krhinos: All right! I'll dig that precious right out of its bed! Tell 
me if you read something on scanners.

He turned the Colossus Drill back on and slowly proceeded to drill 
the energon.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Rukus--
> 
> "There isn't much stable energon around here, so we're doing the 
> best we can to maintain minimal fluctuations," calls Rukus, his 
head 
> still buried in a readings machine. "Just keep going for now, you 
> may experience some minor seismic fluctuations though, just so you 
> are warned. I'll be monitoring them and dampening them."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Krhinos was getting a bit impatient. These tons of Energon right 
> > under his drill were begging him to drill, but he had to be sure 
> of 
> > the vein's stability?
> > 
> > Krhinos: Rukus? Dracon? Can one of you tell me if the source is 
> > stabilized?
